modName: The World Eater - An Alduin Retexture
summary: Gives Alduin a lore-friendly retex, transforming him from an iron-grey meteor rock into the black-winged dragon of legend.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center]Name: The World Eater - An Alduin Retexture
Version: 1.0
Date: 9/28/2013
Category: Models and Textures
Author(s): AurianaValoria1
Source: SkyrimNexus

[center]
[size=3]Just putting this out there to make it clear:

[b][i]I will not grant anyone else permission to port my Skyrim mods to SSE. I will do it myself when I have the inclination and the opportunity.[/i][/b]

I'm sorry if this decision disappoints you, but I would like to be responsible for my own mod pages and how the mods behave in the game.

I have no idea how my mods for Oldrim will work in SSE, even after conversion, and I want to have a proper handle on that [i]myself [/i]before I put them out there for other people to use in their games.[/size]

[size=3]Thanks,[/size]
[b][font=Georgia][color=#B45F06][size=3]Auri[/size][/color][/font][/b][/center]

Details
=======
Simply alters Alduin's textures to a darker and less shiny version. I've also slightly adjusted his eyes to be a darker and more vibrant red.

**Note: Any mod that references Alduin's textures will change with this mod. IE: If an armor mod uses Alduin's textures, the color of the armor will change to match the dragon.**

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location like the desktop.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)SkyrimData

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the file folder called "Alduin" in SkryimDatatexturesactors.


Incompatibility
===============
Any other mod that retextures Alduin. This mod does have its own normalmap, so if you use a mod that alters Alduin's normal, this will overwrite that file as well.


History
=======
1.0, 2013/09/28 - Initial release.

Contact
=======
Comment or send me a PM.

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip
GIMP
Paint.NET
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
This mod is not to be distributed to any other site, regardless of whether or not you can contact me. Translations are welcome, but I would appreciate a PM.
author: AurianaValoria1
